languages.text: {n}Пока вы нажимаете клавиши, когитатор кажется дремлющим, но с последней буквой второго слова вдруг оживает. Откуда-то из его глубин льется торжественная музыка, а затем — и голос. Приятный, мужской, выговаривающий слова готика несколько старомодно.{/n} "Приветствую!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Пока вы нажимаете клавиши, когитатор кажется дремлющим, но с последней буквой второго слова вдруг оживает. Откуда-то из его глубин льется торжественная музыка, а затем — и голос. Приятный, мужской, выговаривающий слова готика несколько старомодно.{/n} "Приветствую!"

languages.text: {n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"
languages.original_text: {n}Пока вы нажимаете клавиши, когитатор кажется дремлющим, но с последней буквой второго слова вдруг оживает. Откуда-то из его глубин льется торжественная музыка, а затем — и голос. Приятный, мужской, выговаривающий слова готика несколько старомодно.{/n} "Приветствую!"

traits.locale_text: {n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"

{n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"

{n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"

languages.text: {n}キーを押している間、考算機は作動していないように見えたが、最後の文字を入力したところ、息を吹き返したように突然動き出した。歓喜の音楽が流れ出し、発声した。心地よい男の声で、少々古い帝国後で喋った。{/n}「ごきげんよう！」
languages.original_text: {n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}キーを押している間、考算機は作動していないように見えたが、最後の文字を入力したところ、息を吹き返したように突然動き出した。歓喜の音楽が流れ出し、発声した。心地よい男の声で、少々古い帝国後で喋った。{/n}「ごきげんよう！」

languages.text: {n}当你输入文字的时候，沉思者似乎处于休眠状态，但当你输入到最后一个字时，沉思者突然活了过来。胜利的音乐倾泻而出，随后响起了一个声音。那是个男性的声音，带着悦耳而有些过时的哥特语口音，对你开了口。{/n}“你好！”
languages.original_text: {n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}当你输入文字的时候，思考器似乎处于休眠状态，但当你输入到最后一个字时，思考器突然活了过来。胜利的音乐倾泻而出，随后响起了一个声音。那是个男性的声音，带着悦耳而有些过时的哥特语口音，对你开了口。{/n}“你好！”

languages.text: {n}Mientras pulsas las teclas, el cogitador parece estar dormido, pero al escribir la última letra de la segunda palabra, de pronto cobra vida. Una música triunfal brota del interior, acompañada de una voz. Un hombre de tono agradable y una pronunciación un tanto anticuada de Gótico, te saluda:{/n} «¡Salve!».
languages.original_text: {n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mientras pulsas las teclas, el cogitador parece estar dormido, pero al escribir la última letra de la segunda palabra, de pronto cobra vida. Una música triunfal brota del interior, acompañada de una voz. Un hombre de tono agradable y una pronunciación un tanto anticuada de Gótico, te saluda:{/n} «¡Salve!».

languages.text: {n}Le cogitateur semble être en veille, mais lorsque vous tapez la dernière lettre du troisième mot, il prend soudain vie. Une musique triomphante retentit, accompagnée d'une voix masculine agréable dans laquelle on décèle un accent gothique quelque peu désuet.{/n} « Salutations ! »
languages.original_text: {n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cogitateur semble être en veille, mais lorsque vous tapez la dernière lettre du troisième mot, il prend soudain vie. Une musique triomphante retentit, accompagnée d'une voix masculine agréable dans laquelle on décèle un accent gothique quelque peu désuet.{/n} « Salutations ! »

languages.text: {n}Während du die Tasten drückst, scheint der Cogitator inaktiv zu sein, doch als du den letzten Buchstaben des zweiten Worts drückst, erwacht er plötzlich zum Leben. Triumphale Musik ertönt, gefolgt von einer Stimme. Sie gehört einem Mann, klingt angenehm und hat eine leicht veraltete Aussprache des Gotischen.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt!"
languages.original_text: {n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Während du die Tasten drückst, scheint der Cogitator inaktiv zu sein, doch als du den letzten Buchstaben des zweiten Worts drückst, erwacht er plötzlich zum Leben. Triumphale Musik ertönt, gefolgt von einer Stimme. Sie gehört einem Mann, klingt angenehm und hat eine leicht veraltete Aussprache des Gotischen.{/n} "Seid gegrüßt!"

languages.text: {n}Tuşlara basarken kavramsayar faal değilmiş gibi görünse de üçüncü kelimenin son harfine basmanla beraber bir anda hayata dönüyor. İçinden bir zafer marşının ezgileri yükseliyor, bunu da Gotik'in biraz eski bir telaffuzuna hâkim, hoş bir erkek sesi takip ediyor:{/n} "Merhaba!"
languages.original_text: {n}While you're pressing the keys, the cogitator appears dormant, but as you enter the last letter of the second word, it suddenly comes to life. Triumphant music pours out of it, followed by a voice. A man's voice, pleasant, with a somewhat dated pronunciation of Gothic.{/n} "Greetings!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tuşlara basarken kavramsayar faal değilmiş gibi görünüyor ama ikinci kelimenin son harfine bastığın anda aniden hayata dönüyor. İçinden bir zafer marşının ezgileri yükseliyor ve bunu bir ses takip ediyor. Gotik'in biraz eskide kalmış telaffuzunu kullanan, hoş bir erkek sesi:{/n} "Merhaba!"
